DOC.brief_title: Combination Chemotherapy Followed Radiation Therapy Before Surgery Treating Patients With Stage IIIB NSCLC
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine feasibility efficacy sequential neoadjuvant docetaxel , cisplatin , radiotherapy follow surgery patient operable stage IIIB non-small cell lung cancer . - Determine rate event-free survival 1 year patient treat regimen . - Determine operability complete resection rate patient treat regimen . - Determine postoperative 30-day mortality patient treat regimen . - Determine response rate , failure pattern , overall survival patient treat regimen . - Determine toxicity regimen patient . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive docetaxel IV 1 hour cisplatin IV 1 hour day 1 . Treatment repeat every 3 week 3 course absence unacceptable toxicity . Beginning 3 week last chemotherapy dose , patient without progressive disease receive radiotherapy 1-2 time daily day 1-5 , 8-12 , 15-19 . Patients undergo surgery within 3-4 week completion radiotherapy . Patients follow 1 month every 3 month thereafter . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 15-46 patient accrue study .
